rules.title: Rules of 3D Tic Tac Toe
rules.description: 3D Tic Tac Toe is a variation of the classic game played on four boards. Your goal is to create a line of four symbols (X or O) in any direction.
rules.step1: Winning conditions are the same as in the basic version, but you need to align four symbols (X or O) in a line. Other winning patterns derive from the basic rules:
rules.theSome: When the 4 boards are stacked, you get the following effect:
rules.rules4Question: After stacking the boards, you see that the Xs are in the same spots. So where is the line?
rules.rules4-info: You can see it when you rotate the stacked boards at a certain angle. The line becomes visible.
